summary: A simple mod that advances time when foods are cooked.
descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=#e4a05e]Description[/color][/heading]

This mod is some what of an expansion on my previous mod Skinning Takes Time.  Like STT this mod\'s aim is to add some realism to the crafting and harvesting systems.

[heading][color=#e4a05e]What It Does[/color][/heading]

This mod very simply causes time to pass when a food is crafted at any typical cooking pot.

The logic used behind all the times used:


Current Version

units in hours

Item - Time

[b][color=#5EA2E5]Vanilla[/b][/color]

Elsweyr Fondue - 0.5
Cabbage Potato Soup - 0.5
Vegetable soup - 0.5
Tomato Stew - 0.5
Venison Stew - 0.5
Horker Stew - 0.5
Beef Stew - 0.5
Apple Cabbage Stew - 0.5
venison Chop - 0.4
Salmon Steak - 0.3
Rabbit Haunch - 0.2
Phesant Roast - 0.3
Mammoth Steak - 0.4
Horse Haunch - 0.4
Horker Loaf - 0.4
Leg of Goat - 0.4
Cooked Beef - 0.4
Grilled Chicken Breast - 0.3
Seared Slaughterfish - 0.2
Cabbage Soup - 0.5

[b][color=#5EA2E5]Hearthfire[/b][/color]

Lavender Dumpling - 0.3
Chicken Dumpling - 0.3
Salmon Steak - 0.3
Steamed Mudcrab Legs - 0.3
Clam Chowder - 0.5
Potato Soup - 0.5
Butter - 0.2
SnowBerry Crostata - 0.4
Jazbay Crostata - 0.4
Juniper Berry Crostata - 0.4
Sack of Flour - 0.2
Potato Bread - 0.6
Apple Dumpling - 0.3
Garlic Bread - 0.3
Braided Bread - 0.6

[b][color=#5EA2E5]Dragonborn[/b][/color]

Cooked Boar Meat - 0.4
Horker and Ash Yam Stew - 0.5


[b][color=#5EA2E5]Realistic Wild Life[/b][/color]

Rabbit Sandwich - 0.4
Wolf Roast - 0.5
Elk Venison Stew - 0.5
Elk Venison Chop - 0.4
Bear Roast, Marinated - 0.8
Sabre Cat Roast - 0.6
Skeever Stew - 0.5
Bear Roast - 0.6
Spicy Sabre Cat Stew - 0.5
Mudcrab and Clam Chowder - 0.5
MMarinated Mammoth Steak - 0.4
Garlic Dog Ribs - 0.4	
Goat Steak - 0.3
Grilled Fox Meat - 0.2
Bear Sausage - 0.6

[b][color=#5EA2E5]Imp\'s More Complex Needs[/b][/color]

Dried Mammoth Snout - 0.3
Dried Goat Meat - 0.3
Dried Venison - 0.3
Dried Beef - 0.3
Dried Salmon - 0.2
Grilled Clam - 0.2
Tea - 0.1
Coffee - 0.1

If I missed any tell me and I\'ll get on it

Also if a time seem off a bit feel free to suggest a new one


[heading][color=#e4a05e]Install[/color][/heading]

Install with Nexus Mod Manager (suggested) 

1. download with manager 
2. activate


Manual Install

1. download
2. unpack contents of .rar to data folder (will not override any thing)
3. activate with manager of your choice 

To Uninstall simply remove the following files:

data/CookingTakesTime.esp
data/scripts/CTTQuest.pex
data/scripts/CookingTakesTime.pex
data/scripts/source/CTTQuest.psc
data/scripts/source/CookingTakesTime.psc
data/readmes/CookingTakesTime.txt

[heading][color=#e4a05e]Compatibility[/color][/heading]

This mod edits nothing in the world space nor does it edit any items or items\' references at all, so there should be no compatibility issues.  Any mods that add any cookable items to the crafting menusare not completely compatible with that mod.  Some mods will have compatibility patches made for them.

Suggested compatibility patched are welcome but there is no guarantee that any thing will happen.

[heading][color=#e4a05e]Special Thanks[/color][/heading]

Bethesda - for creating a great game and supporting the modding community

[heading][color=#e4a05e]Change Log[/color][/heading]

[b][color=#5EA2E5]ver 1.1[/b][/color]


Removed need for patches and included all dlc items without requiring dlc or adding items

Integrated stuff:

Dragonborn Patch
Hearthfire Patch

Realistic Wildlife Loot Patch
Imp\'s More complex Needs

[heading][color=#e4a05e]Distribution[/color][/heading]

Please do not re-upload this mod on any other site without first contacting the author for permission.  If this mod is broken by a Bethesda patch and the author cannot be reached to resolve the problem within a reasonable amount of time, this mod becomes the domain of the nexus community. Also if this mod is abandoned by the author for whatever reason, this mod becomes the domain of the nexus community.
author: Dogtown182
